hiveArticle.title: B&W Photo Contest - Theme Sunset / Sunrise - Multiple Entries
hiveArticle.body:
## <center>Namaste, below Entries is for B&W Photo Contest by @daveks. The theme is Sunset/Sunrise for this week. </center>

<hr>

#### <center> Two of the them were taken in Bangalore, India whereas the last one is taken in Nandi Hills, Karnataka.</center>
#### <center> Camera Used : Nokia 6 Mobile Camera - 16 MP, Edited and removed the Color from the photo. </center>

<hr>

## <center> Entry 1 - Sunset</center>
<hr>

![IMG_20170919_181128~2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNQotiWoPYCyEpHAT2aLknDchE5g2kpghEqQm2Hz1NpKE/IMG_20170919_181128~2.jpg)

<hr>

## <center> Entry 2 - Sunset</center>
<hr>

![IMG_20170912_180254~2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVhqsyg43xrMRMjboTtrZhXcFGNakDCr3Nco6sjCaPsoo/IMG_20170912_180254~2.jpg)

<hr>

## <center> Entry 3 - Sunrise On a Foggy Morning in Nandi Hills</center>
<hr>

![imageedit_3_9709630478.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTsrcsrvXjc5Qqxv3vTM3StzctVQakVQfjDsmWSQ3YGoK/imageedit_3_9709630478.jpg)

<hr>

### <center> If you liked my work, please do follow @codingdefined </center>
